item.description:
Organized by the DCR:

First Day Hikes 2009
Thursday, January 1
Free hot & hearty soup at noon
All hikes begin at 1:00 pm

Meet at the Houghton's Pond main parking lot, 840 Hillside Street in Milton.
Celebrate the New Year in the Blue Hills. This is year eighteen of the DCR's annual New Yearâ€™s tradition! Join the fun. Last year theyt had bonfires to warm up by.
Warm up with a free cup of hearty soup, then stretch your legs on a variety of guided hikes suitable for all ages and abilities. A great way to jump start the year! For more information, call 617-698-1802.
item.name: First Day Hike with the DCR in Blue Hills
